rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious hall with natural lighting and Bohemian decor, featuring a mix of vibrant colors and textures. It acts as the transition from garden to interior space.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-concept living area blending dining and lounge spaces. Features Bohemian art pieces, vintage furniture, and large windows facing the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet rustic kitchen with an island counter; includes Vastu compliant orientation (facing east or north) to harness positive energy. Decorated with eclectic Bohemian elements such as colorful tiles.

rooms.name: Master Suite
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, private balcony facing the garden for meditative morning views and Vastu aligned eastward for positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with a view of the garden. Decorated in Bohemian style with layered textures and earthy tones, following Vastu principles by placing it on the south-east corner.

openings.description: Large entrance door with natural lighting to set a welcoming tone. Follows Vastu norms for north-facing entry.
Stunning windows that maximize morning light, crucial for energy flow according to Vastu.
